item.title: SENAITE IMPRESS
item.description: Overview SENAITE IMPRESS is basically a rendering engine for HTML documents to PDF. It supports any kind of international paperformat with their corresponding paper dimensions, portrait and landscape orientation and merging of multiple PDFs to one document. — —

item.title: Senaite Spotlight Search
item.description: Overview Senaite Spotlight Search is a modern JavaScript application written with CoffeeScript and based on the BackboneJS framework. It communicates with Senaite LIMS through plone.jsonapi.routes. See it in Action — —

item.title: SENAITE Commander
item.description: Overview SENAITE Commander is a cross platform web application based on Electron and ExtJS. It communicates with SENAITE LIMS through plone.jsonapi.routes. See it in Action — —
